ar_SA.name: Arabic (Saudi Arabia)
ar_SA.notes: Use Modern Standard Arabic. Keep technical terms in Latin script when commonly used. Use formal tone for system messages.

bg_BG.name: Bulgarian
bg_BG.notes: Use standard Bulgarian. Technical terms should be transliterated or kept in English when commonly used.

cs_CZ.name: Czech
cs_CZ.notes: Use standard Czech. Pay attention to declension cases for UI elements.

de_DE.name: German
de_DE.notes: Use standard German. Capitalize nouns appropriately. Use formal 'Sie' form for system messages.

fr_FR.name: French
fr_FR.notes: Use standard French. Pay attention to gender agreement and formal 'vous' form.

hu_HU.name: Hungarian
hu_HU.notes: Use standard Hungarian. Pay attention to definite/indefinite articles and case endings.

it_IT.name: Italian
it_IT.notes: Use standard Italian. Pay attention to gender agreement and formal tone.

ja_JP.name: Japanese
ja_JP.notes: Use polite form (丁寧語). Mix Hiragana, Katakana, and Kanji appropriately. Keep technical terms in Katakana when commonly used.

ko_KR.name: Korean
ko_KR.notes: Use formal/polite form (존댓말). Technical terms can be kept in English or translated to Hangul based on common usage.

nl_NL.name: Dutch
nl_NL.notes: Use standard Dutch. Pay attention to formal tone and compound word formation.

pl_PL.name: Polish
pl_PL.notes: Use standard Polish. Pay attention to declension cases and formal tone.

pt_PT.name: Portuguese
pt_PT.notes: Use European Portuguese. Pay attention to gender agreement and formal tone.

ro_RO.name: Romanian
ro_RO.notes: Use standard Romanian. Pay attention to definite articles and formal tone.

ru_RU.name: Russian
ru_RU.notes: Use standard Russian. Pay attention to declension cases and formal tone (вы form).

sk_SK.name: Slovak
sk_SK.notes: Use standard Slovak. Pay attention to declension cases and formal tone.

sr_SR.name: Serbian
sr_SR.notes: Use Cyrillic script. Pay attention to formal tone and technical term adaptation.

tr_TR.name: Turkish
tr_TR.notes: Use standard Turkish. Pay attention to vowel harmony and formal tone.

uk_UA.name: Ukrainian
uk_UA.notes: Use standard Ukrainian. Pay attention to declension cases and formal tone (ви form).

zh_TW.name: Chinese (Traditional)
zh_TW.notes: Use Traditional Chinese characters. Keep technical terms appropriate for Taiwan usage.

es_ES.name: Spanish (Spain)
es_ES.notes: Use standard European Spanish. Use formal 'usted' form for system messages. Keep technical terms in English when commonly used (API, URL, etc.). Use Spanish translation for generic tech terms. Pay attention to gender agreement.
